items.text: superb execution! What a way to bring up his fifty, Bangladesh's Mr Consistent. His 34th ODI fifty. Banged in short outside off, he rides the bounce and cuts over point. Third man had no chance.
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: gets it high on the bat as he shapes to pull, on the bounce to mid-on
items.postText: maan: "All Bangladesh need to do now is to capitalize on this. the finishing. the thing missing from them from long long time. they are much more improved side now. all they need now is to stay focus and not collapse or settle for any thing below 350"
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: slower and fuller on the pads, flicked to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: gets a thick outside edge to short third man
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: makes room and creams this to deep cover
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: works this down to long-on
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: swept fine, no chance for short fine. Poor bowling from Tahir, drifting down leg and Mushfiqur gleefully accepts
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: brings out the audacious reverse-sweep, gets a thin bottom-edge to short third man. Not worth the risk
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: cut away to deep cover
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: chops this down to square third man
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: Santosh Bhat: "Hello World (Cup), from Bangladesh. Unselfish cricket by both batsmen, rotating strike and not worried about individual milestones! An Indian fan tips his hat to the excellent batting display. "
items.text: scythed away! Width outside off, he waits, waits and then cuts hard to find the gap behind point. Down to the boundary rider
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 2 runs

items.text: delicate little late cut to third man
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: gets this to angle back in, rolls off a thick inside edge to midwicket as he looks to drive through mid-on
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: bounced him, nearly did! Looks to hook but is beaten for pace.
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: cut hard, straight to point
items.postText: Lal: "Every team has got high quality wicketkeeper batsmen. Buttler, Bairstow, QDK, MSD, Kusal, Mushi. Will this be wicketkeeper's World Cup? "
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: tucks this to square leg
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: mistimes this hoick back to the bowler, off the toe-end
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: defended to short third man, looked to cut but didn't have the width he would've liked
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: works this low full toss to mid-on, hint of a misfield giving rise to a mix-up, Shakib turns back. He really wanted a run
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: stunning placement! This is a buffet ball from Tahir, wallops this juicy full toss into the gap at midwicket.
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: whips this down to long-on
items.shortText: Imran Tahir to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: bunts this down to third man
items.shortText: Rabada to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: steered behind point to square third man, rode the bounce nicely
items.shortText: Rabada to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: driven hard, straight to mid-off
items.postText: Breaking: Andrew Miller confirms Ngidi won't bowl today. In fact, he won't take further part in the game. Just keeps going from bad to worse for South Africa
items.shortText: Rabada to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: right on top of the bounce as he buns this behind square on the off side as they scamper a single
items.shortText: Rabada to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run
